CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
OldVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
OldVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for learner record sync (LRS)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - New enhancements in Workday integration
OldVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
OldVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
OldVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: View only mode in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,Engage admins will have the ability to change users' access to view only mode. In view only mode, users can access and view content in Engage, but cannot comment, react, or create new posts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: View only mode in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: ,Engage admins will have the ability to change users' access to view only mode. In view only mode, users can access and view content in Engage, but cannot comment, react, or create new posts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
OldVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
OldVersion.description: ,Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Microsoft Copilot available in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the user’s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
OldVersion.description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the user’s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.
